p:
Our ENM results for three Rhodiola species for which there are molecular phylogeographic information ( R. kirilowii, R. dumulosa and R. alsia) were consistent with published studies, suggesting that the southeastern QTP and HM were the center from which Rhodiola lineages spread to occupy broader geographic ranges from the LGM to the present day (Fig. 3; Supplementary Figs S2– S4)
17– 19 . Consistency of these published results with our own findings, increases confidence in our ENM interpretations.
